text: The 2017 African Women's Handball Cup Winners' Cup was the 33rd edition, organized by the African Handball Confederation, under the auspices of the International Handball Federation, the handball sport governing body. The tournament was held from April 13–22, 2017 in one venue: the Salle Omnisport Al Inbiâat, in Agadir, Morocco, contested by 7 teams and won by 1º de Agosto of Angola thus successfully defending its title. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" !width=195px|Participating teams |- |valign=top| CARA Brazzaville FAP Yaoundé HC Vainqueur Kada Queens Primeiro de Agosto Tana HBC US Nouasseur |} ==Schedule &
